Während dieser Zeit verströmt das Schneckenhaus helles Licht in einem Radius von 40 Fuß und schwaches Licht in einem weiteren Radius von 40 Fuß, und Kreaturen, die die Dreschflegelschnecke sehen können, haben bei Angriffswürfen gegen sie einen Nachteil. Außerdem muss jede Kreatur, die sich innerhalb des hellen Lichts befindet und die Schlegelschnecke sehen kann, wenn diese Fähigkeit aktiviert wird, einen {@dc 18} Rettungswurf in Weisheit bestehen oder {@condition stunned} leiden, bis das Licht endet.

action.name: Shell Defense
entries: Die Schlegelschnecke zieht sich in ihr Schneckenhaus zurück und erhält einen Bonus von +6 auf AC, bis sie wieder auftaucht. Sie kann in ihrem Zug als Bonusaktion aus ihrem Schneckenhaus auftauchen.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Der Froschhemoth kann Luft und Wasser atmen.

trait.name: Shock Susceptibility
entries: Wenn der Froschhemoth Blitzschaden erleidet, erleidet er bis zum Ende seines nächsten Zuges mehrere Effekte: Seine Geschwindigkeit wird halbiert, er erleidet einen Malus von -2 auf AC und Rettungswürfe in Geschicklichkeit, er kann keine Reaktionen oder Mehrfachangriffe einsetzen und kann in seinem Zug entweder eine Aktion oder eine Bonusaktion einsetzen, nicht beides.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} bis zum Treffer, Reichweite 5 ft., ein Ziel. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) Stich-Schaden.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Der Froschhemoth kann Luft und Wasser atmen.

trait.name: Shock Susceptibility
entries: Wenn der Froschhemoth Blitzschaden erleidet, erleidet er bis zum Ende seines nächsten Zuges mehrere Effekte: Seine Geschwindigkeit wird halbiert, er erleidet einen Malus von -2 auf AC und Rettungswürfe in Geschicklichkeit, er kann keine Reaktionen oder Mehrfachangriffe einsetzen und kann in seinem Zug entweder eine Aktion oder eine Bonusaktion einsetzen, nicht beides.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Der Froschhemoth führt zwei Angriffe mit seinen Tentakeln aus. Er kann auch seine Zunge benutzen oder beißen.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} auf Treffer, Reichweite 15 Fuß, ein Ziel. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Wuchtschaden, und das Ziel ist {@condition grappled} (Flucht {@dc 14}), wenn es eine große oder kleinere Kreatur ist. Bis zum Ende des Haltegriffs kann der Froschhemoth diesen Tentakel nicht auf ein anderes Ziel anwenden. Der Froschhemoth hat vier Tentakel.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} auf Treffer, Reichweite 5 Fuß, ein Ziel. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Stich-Schaden und das Ziel wird verschluckt, wenn es sich um eine mittlere oder kleinere Kreatur handelt. Eine verschluckte Kreatur ist {@condition blinded} und {@condition restrained}, hat totale Deckung vor Angriffen und anderen Effekten außerhalb des Froschhemoths und erleidet zu Beginn jeder Runde des Froschhemoths 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Säureschaden.

Der Schlund des Froschhemoths kann bis zu zwei Kreaturen auf einmal aufnehmen. Wenn der Froschfresser in einem einzigen Zug 10 oder mehr Schaden durch eine Kreatur in seinem Inneren erleidet, muss der Froschfresser am Ende dieses Zuges einen Rettungswurf auf {@dc 17} Konstitution bestehen oder alle verschluckten Kreaturen wieder auswürgen, von denen jede {@condition prone} in einen Raum innerhalb von 10 Fuß um den Froschfresser fällt. Wenn der Froschhemoth stirbt, wird eine verschluckte Kreatur nicht mehr {@condition restrained} von ihm gehalten und kann mit einer Bewegungszeit von 5 Fuß aus dem Leichnam entkommen, indem sie {@condition prone} verlässt.

action.name: Tongue
entries: Der Froschhemoth zielt auf eine kleine oder kleinere Kreatur, die er im Umkreis von 15 Fuß sehen kann. Das Ziel muss einen {@dc 15} Rettungswurf auf Stärke machen. Bei einem misslungenen Schutzwurf wird das Ziel in einen unbesetzten Raum im Umkreis von 5 Fuß um den Froschfresser gezogen, und der Froschfresser kann als Bonusaktion einen Bissangriff gegen das Ziel durchführen.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Die angeborene Fähigkeit des Riesen zur Zauberei ist Charisma (Zauberschutz {@dc 16}). Er kann von Natur aus die folgenden Zauber wirken, ohne materielle Komponenten zu benötigen:

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: Der Riese kann in jeder seiner Spielrunden die Aktionen Dash, Disengage oder {@action Hide} als Bonusaktion ausführen.

trait.name: Cunning Insight {@recharge 5}
entries: Als Bonusaktion wählt der Wolkenriese ein Ziel, das er im Umkreis von 30 Fuß sehen kann. Der Wolkenriese und bis zu 3 Kreaturen seiner Wahl haben Vorteil auf Fähigkeitsproben, Angriffswürfe und Rettungswürfe gegen das Ziel. Außerdem hat das Ziel Nachteil bei Fähigkeitsprüfungen und Angriffswürfen gegen den Wolkenriesen. Diese Effekte halten bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Wolkenriesen an.

trait.name: Cunning Presence
entries: Ein Verbündeter, der seinen Zug in einem Umkreis von 30 Fuß um diesen Riesen beginnt und diesen Riesen sehen und hören kann, kann in diesem Zug die Aktion Hetzen, Ausweichen oder {@action Hide} als Bonusaktion ausführen, sofern der Riese nicht {@condition incapacitated} ist.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: Der Riese hat einen Vorteil bei Weisheitsüberprüfungen ({@skill Perception}), die sich auf den Geruchssinn beziehen.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Der Riese macht zwei Morgenstern-Angriffe.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} Treffer, Reichweite 10 ft., ein Ziel. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) Stich-Schaden. Der Angriff verursacht zusätzlich 17 ({@damage 5d6}) Schaden, wenn der Riese beim Angriffswurf im Vorteil ist.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} Treffer, Reichweite 60/240 ft., ein Ziel. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) Schaden durch Wucht. Der Angriff verursacht zusätzlich 17 ({@damage 5d6}) Schaden, wenn der Riese beim Angriffswurf im Vorteil ist.

reaction.name: Misdirection
entries: Wenn der Riese von einem Angriff getroffen wird, während eine Kreatur im Umkreis von 5 Fuß ihm Deckung gegen diesen Angriff gewährt, kann er den Angriff stattdessen auf diese Kreatur richten.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Die angeborene Fähigkeit des Riesen zur Zauberei ist Charisma (Zauberschutz {@dc 16}). Er kann von Natur aus die folgenden Zauber wirken, ohne materielle Komponenten zu benötigen:

trait.name: Evasion
entries: Wenn der Riese einem Effekt ausgesetzt ist, der es ihm erlaubt, einen Rettungswurf in Geschicklichkeit zu machen, um nur halben Schaden zu erleiden, erleidet er keinen Schaden, wenn der Rettungswurf gelingt, und nur halben Schaden, wenn er scheitert.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: Der Riese hat einen Vorteil bei Weisheitsüberprüfungen ({@skill Perception}), die sich auf den Geruchssinn beziehen.

trait.name: Stunning Strike (3/Day)
entries: Wenn der Riese einmal pro Runde eine Kreatur mit einem Nahkampfangriff trifft, kann er diese Kreatur dazu zwingen, einen {@dc 16} Rettungswurf auf die Konstitution zu machen oder bis zum Ende der nächsten Runde der Kreatur {@condition stunned} zu sein.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Der Riese führt drei unbewaffnete Schläge aus. Er kann die Riesenfaust der ungebrochenen Luft anstelle eines unbewaffneten Schlags einsetzen, falls verfügbar.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} Treffer, Reichweite 10 ft., ein Ziel. {@h}20 ({@dice 3d8 + 7}) Schaden durch Wucht.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} bis zum Treffer, Reichweite 60/240 Fuß, ein Ziel. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) Schaden durch Wucht.

action.name: Giant Fist of Unbroken Air (3/Day, 1/Turn)
entries: Der Riese wählt eine Kreatur aus, die er im Umkreis von 60 Fuß sehen kann, und trifft sie mit einem Luftdruckstoß. Die Kreatur muss einen {@dc 16} Rettungswurf in Stärke machen. Bei einem misslungenen Schutzwurf erleidet die Kreatur 33 ({@damage 6d10}) Wuchtschaden und wird bis zu 30 Fuß weit weggestoßen und {@condition prone} umgeworfen. Bei einem erfolgreichen Schutzwurf erleidet die Kreatur nur halb so viel Schaden und wird weder gestoßen noch umgestoßen {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Die angeborene Fähigkeit des Riesen zur Zauberei ist Weisheit (Zauberschutz {@dc 16}). Der Riese kann die folgenden Zaubersprüche von Natur aus wirken, ohne dass er materielle Komponenten benötigt:

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: Eine Kreatur, die den Riesen berührt oder ihn mit einem Nahkampfangriff trifft, während sie sich in einem Umkreis von 5 Fuß um ihn befindet, erleidet 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Feuerschaden.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/day)
entries: Der Riese kann einen misslungenen Rettungswurf wiederholen. Er muss den neuen Wurf verwenden.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Der Riese führt zwei Großschwert-Attacken aus. Falls verfügbar, kann er anstelle einer dieser Attacken "Bogenschießende Feuerklinge" einsetzen.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} auf Treffer, Reichweite 10 Fuß, ein Ziel. {@h}29 ({@damage 6d6 + 8}) Hiebschaden plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Feuerschaden und wenn das Ziel nicht immun gegen Feuer ist, wird es bis zum Ende des nächsten Zuges des Riesen verwundbar gegen Feuer.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} auf Treffer, Reichweite 60/240 Fuß, ein Ziel. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) Schaden durch Wucht plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Feuerschaden.

action.name: Arcing Fireblade {@recharge 5}
entries: Der Riese schwingt sein Großschwert in einem vollen Bogen, und jede Kreatur im Umkreis von 10 Fuß muss einen {@dc 21} Rettungswurf in Geschicklichkeit bestehen. Bei einem misslungenen Schutzwurf erleidet die Kreatur 29 ({@damage 6d6 + 8}) Hiebschaden plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Feuerschaden, und wenn das Ziel nicht immun gegen Feuer ist, wird es bis zum Ende des nächsten Zuges des Riesen verwundbar gegen Feuerschaden. Bei einem erfolgreichen Schutz erleidet die Kreatur nur halb so viel Schaden und ist nicht verwundbar für Feuerschaden.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Der Riese ist ein Zauberwirker der Stufe 11. Seine Zauberfähigkeit ist Charisma (Zauberschutz {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} um mit Zauberangriffen zu treffen). Er erhält seine verbrauchten Zauberslots zurück, wenn er eine kurze oder lange Ruhepause beendet. Er kennt die folgenden Hexenmeister-Zaubersprüche:

trait.name: Hexblade's Curse (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Als Bonusaktion zielt der Riese auf eine Kreatur im Umkreis von 30 Fuß, die er sehen kann. Das Ziel wird für 1 Minute verflucht. Der Fluch endet vorzeitig, wenn das Ziel stirbt, der Riese stirbt oder er {@condition incapacitated} ist. Bis der Fluch endet, erhält der Riese die folgenden Vorteile:
- Er verursacht bei Schadenswürfen gegen das verfluchte Ziel 3 zusätzlichen Schaden.
- Jeder Angriffswurf gegen das verfluchte Ziel ist ein kritischer Treffer bei einem Wurf von 19 oder 20 auf die {@dice d20}.
- Wenn das verfluchte Ziel stirbt, erhält der Riese 14 Trefferpunkte zurück.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Der Riese führt zwei Langwort-Angriffe aus.

action.name: Longword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} auf Treffer, Reichweite 10 Fuß, ein Ziel. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) Hiebschaden plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Feuerschaden.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} bis zum Treffer, Reichweite 60/240 Fuß, ein Ziel. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) Schaden durch Wucht.

reaction.name: Armor of Hexes
entries: Wenn du von einem Angriffswurf einer Kreatur getroffen wirst, die mit dem Fluch der Hexenklinge des Riesen verflucht ist, wirf einen {@dice d6}. Bei einem Wurf von 4 oder höher verfehlt der Angriff stattdessen den Riesen, unabhängig von seinem Wurf.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Die angeborene Fähigkeit des Riesen zur Zauberei ist Weisheit. Der Riese kann die folgenden Zaubersprüche von Natur aus wirken, ohne dass er materielle Komponenten benötigt:

trait.name: Command Hound
entries: As a bonus action, the giant targets one hound ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the giant, the target can use its reaction to move up to half their speed and make one melee attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greatsword attacks. It can use Maneuver Hounds in place of one attack, if available.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} bis zum Treffer, Reichweite 60/240 Fuß, ein Ziel. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) Schaden durch Wucht.

action.name: Maneuver Hounds {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to four hound allies within 60 feet of this giant that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

action.name: Summon Hounds (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The giant summons {@dice 1d4 + 2} hellhounds or {@dice 1d2} nessian warhounds. The hellhounds appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the giant and acts as its allies. The hellhounds act right after the giant on the same initiative count and fght until they're destroyed. They disappear when the giant dies.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: The giant rerolls a failed save. It must use the new roll.

trait.name: Punish the Marked (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, the giant can make a melee weapon attack against a creature marked by it if the creature dealt damage to anyone other than the giant during the last turn. The giant's melee weapon attack has advantage on the attack roll, and if it hits, the attack's weapon deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Threatening
entries: Creatures provoke an {@action opportunity attack} from the giant when they move 5 feet or more while within the giant's reach, and if the giant hits a creature with an opportunity attack, the target's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of the current turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes three longword attacks.

action.name: Longword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage, and the target is marked until the end of the giant's next turn. This effect ends early if the giant is {@condition incapacitated} or it dies, or if someone else marks the target. While it is within 5 feet of the giant, a creature marked by the giant has disadvantage on any attack roll that doesn't target the giant.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The giant adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the giant must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the giant can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greataxe attacks. It can use Cleaving Swing in place of one of its greataxe attacks, if available.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} bis zum Treffer, Reichweite 60/240 Fuß, ein Ziel. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) Schaden durch Wucht.

action.name: Cleaving Swing {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant swings its greataxe, and each creature within 10 feet of it must  succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). The giant can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Frenzy
entries: The giant can use a bonus action to make one melee weapon attack.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/day)
entries: Der Riese kann einen misslungenen Rettungswurf wiederholen. Er muss den neuen Wurf verwenden.

trait.name: Frost Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: When the giant hits a creature with a melee attack, it can use a bonus action to emit a burst of cold that deals 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage to each creature within 20 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two maul attacks.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature and the attack roll against the target succeeds by 5 or more, the target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} bis zum Treffer, Reichweite 60/240 Fuß, ein Ziel. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) Schaden durch Wucht.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The giant can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Aura of Frost
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the giant takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/day)
entries: Der Riese kann einen misslungenen Rettungswurf wiederholen. Er muss den neuen Wurf verwenden.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage. If the target is a creature, its speed is halved, it can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. The effects last until the start of the giant's next turn.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Freezing Breath {@recharge}
entries: The giant breathes cold in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 54 ({@damage 12d8}) cold damage and if the target is not immune to cold, its speed is halved, it can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. The effects last for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

trait.name: Overbearing
entries: As a bonus action, the giant can make a kick attack against a creature that is Medium or smaller.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d4 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends, and the giant can't use Slam on another target. It can only grapple up to one target at a time.

action.name: Slam Foe
entries: The giant slams a creature {@condition grappled} by it into another creature it can see within 5 feet of it or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the giant's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

action.name: Rock

action.name: Ground Smash {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant slams the ground, triggering an earth tremor and violently pelting the area around it with debris. All creatures on the ground within 15 feet of the giant must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw, taking 20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

While {@condition restrained} by the pseudopods, the creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, it frees itself and the pseudopods vanish.

Empowered Spell: When the goblin rolls damage for a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll up to 3 damage dice. It must use the new rolls. It can use Empowered Spell even if it has already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the goblin casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the giant can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sticky Body
entries: When the golem is hit by a melee weapon attack, the attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw, or the weapon becomes stuck to the golem's body. If the weapon's wielder can't or won't let go of the weapon, the wielder is {@condition grappled} while the weapon is stuck. While stuck, the weapon can't be used. A creature can pull the weapon free by taking an action to make a {@dc 15} Strength check and succeeding.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the golem's turns and the golem can't use one of its slam attacks. While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded}, and at risk of suffocating. The golem can grapple up to one Large creature or two Medium or smaller creatures at a time.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the girallon can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The girallon has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the girallon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Packmaster
entries: A girallon ally that starts its turn within 30 feet of this girallon that can see or hear this girallon gains Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn, provided this girallon isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The girallon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the girallon can't use one of its claws on another target. A girallon can grapple up to two Large targets, one Large and two Medium targets, or four Medium or smaller targets.

action.name: Body Slam
entries: The girallon slams creatures {@condition grappled} by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the girallon's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the girallon can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The girallon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the girallon can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The girallon makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws. It can use Body Slam in place of two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the girallon can't use one of its claws on another target. A girallon can grapple up to two targets.

action.name: Body Slam
entries: The girallon slams creatures {@condition grappled} by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or take 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the girallon's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the girallon can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The girallon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Smite Good (3/day)
entries: As a bonus action, the girallon deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage when it hits a good-aligned target with a weapon attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The girallon makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} Treffer, Reichweite 5 ft., ein Ziel. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) Hiebschaden.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the girallon's choice that is within 30 feet of the girallon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the girallon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githyanki makes two greatsword attacks. It can use Command or Maneuver Allies in place of one of these attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit., reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Command
entries: The githyanki targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the githyanki, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to four allies within 60 feet of this githyanki that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githyanki makes two longsword attacks and uses Psionic Blast. It can use Ego Whip, Psychic Blast, or Psychic Crush in place of Psionic Blast.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Psionic Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Ego Whip {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature the githyanki can see within 60 feet of it must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage, and it is flled with self-doubt, leaving it able to use its action on its next turn only to take the Dodge, Disengage, or Hide action. On a successful saving throw, the target takes half as much damage.

action.name: Psychic Blast {@recharge}
entries: The githyanki unleashes devastating psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Psychic Crush (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The githyanki creates a 20-foot cube of psychic energy within 120 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 45 ({@damage 10d8}) psychic damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of the githyanki's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Flaming Weapon
entries: As a bonus action, the githyanki can imbue its melee weapon with fire. For 1 minute, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d6} fire damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githyanki makes two dagger attacks. It can use Combustion, Rolling Flame, or Detionation in place of one of these attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Combustion
entries: One creature or object the githyanki can see within 120 feet of it must make a {@dc 15} Constitution save. On a failed save, the target takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) fire damage and it catches on fire taking 5  ({@dice 1d10}) fire damage at the end of each of its turns until the githyanki's concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell) or a creature adjacent to it extinguishes the flames with an action. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

action.name: Rolling Flame {@recharge 5}
entries: The githyanki creates fire in a 20-foot-by-20-foot cube within 5 feet of it. The fire lasts until the githyanki's concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell). Any creature in that area when it uses this ability and any creature that ends its turn there takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Detonation (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The githyanki creates a fery explosion at a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) fire damage and being knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The githzerai's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifer.

trait.name: Trace Chance {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the githzerai chooses a target it can see within 30 feet of it. The githzerai gains advantage on the next melee attack roll it makes against the target and if it hits, it is a critical hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githzerai makes two unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The githzerai's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Shocking Weapon
entries: As a bonus action, the githzerai can imbue its melee weapon with lightning. For 1 minute, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d8} lightning damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifer.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githzerai makes two unarmed strikes and uses Hungry Lightning. It can use Lightning Leap or Storm Clap in place of Hungry Lightning.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage. This is a magic weapon attack.

action.name: Hungry Lightning
entries: The githzerai lashes out at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it with tendrils of lightning. The target must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, with disadvantage if it's wearing heavy armor. The target takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Lightning Leap {@recharge 5}
entries: The githzerai lets loose a line of lightning that is 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The githzerai then teleports to an unoccupied space touched by opposite end of the line.

action.name: Storm Clap (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The githzerai chooses a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Thunder and lightning energy erupts in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each creature in that area must make {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 17 ({@dice 5d6}) lightning and 17 ({@damage 5d6}) thunder damage, and it is {@condition stunned} until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The githzerai's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifer.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githzerai makes two unarmed strikes and uses Distracting Haze. It can use Daze or Mind Storm in place of Distracting Haze.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack.

action.name: Distracting Haze
entries: One creature the githzerai can see within 60 feet of it must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage and can't see anything more than 10 feet from it until the githzerai's concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell). On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.

action.name: Daze (Rechareges 5-6)
entries: One creature the githzerai can see within 60 feet of it must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn or until it takes damage.

action.name: Mind Storm (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The githzerai chooses a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) psychic damage and suffers disadvantage on all saving throws until the end of the githzerai's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

trait.name: Aura of Blood Thirst
entries: If the flind isn't {@condition incapacitated}, any creature with the Rampage trait can make a bite attack as a bonus action while within 10 feet of the flind.

trait.name: Distracting Strike (1/Turn)
entries: When the flind hits a creature with a weapon attack, the next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than the flind has advantage if the attack is made before the start of the flind's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The flind makes three attacks: one with each of its different flail attacks or three with its longbow.

action.name: Flail of Madness
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must make a melee attack against a random target within its reach on its next turn. If it has no targets within its reach even after moving, it loses its action on that turn.

action.name: Flail of Pain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage.

action.name: Flail of Paralysis
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to four allies within 60 feet of this flind that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Command Retaliate
entries: In response to a creature missing the flind with a melee attack and the attacker is visible to the flind, it can target an ally within 5 feet of the creature. If the ally can see and hear the flind, it uses its reaction to make one melee weapon attack against the creature with advantage on the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The flind's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}). The flind can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Aura of Blood Thirst

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: The flind rerolls a failed save. It must use the new roll.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Bite

action.name: Flail of Madness
